title: June 28, 2024 — Custom UI in Streamlit in Snowflake –— Preview | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
With this release, we are pleased to announce the preview of Custom UI in Streamlit in Snowflake.
Custom UI enables customization of the look, feel, and front-end behavior of Streamlit in Snowflake apps.
Custom HTML and CSS using unsafe_allow_html=True in st.markdown.
Iframed HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using st.components.v1.html.
For more information, see Additional Streamlit in Snowflake features.
